context: Good day! I have been thinking about seeing Titanic (1997) again. Have you ever seen it?
Haha, yeah way back. It was good. I love My Cousin Vinny (1992) , can you recommend a mob movie?
Would like to know a comedy or something more serious like the Godfather (1991)?
Serious please. I never saw The Godfather (1972)
I never saw 1991's Godfather (1991) either, whatever that is, haha
resp: It's very popular. Perhaps you'd like Goodfellas (1990).
